archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Service verlenen aan klanten in kanalen
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: Het vermogen om klanten diensten en ondersteuning aan te bieden via (digitale) kanalen zoals website, social media, email, telefoon, etc

properties.value: The ability to offer customers and market parties services and support via (digital) channels, e.g. via telephone, email, website, social media, etc.
